description:
Sweat can take a hike while you stay toasty. With breathable jersey fabric at the back and windproof front fabric, you can have the best of both worlds. Bonus laser-cut holes behind the knee add ventilation, so you can speed ahead.

  • Warm 2-layer front fabric with light insulation and smooth jersey fabric at the back for uninhibited movement
  • Front and lower leg panels feature wind and waterproof fabric to keep that pesky snow from cooling you down
  • Lazer cut ventilation holes at the back of the knee help keep sweat to a minimum
  • Elastic waist band and silicone leg endings help keep these planted when the going gets tough
  • Zippers at the legs help you get these on
  • Zippered side pocket keeps snacks at the ready for long ski sessions
  • A snug fit allows you to focus on the trail ahead
name: Craft ADV Nordic Training Speed Pants - Men's
